languages.text: "Изменой. Капитан Френзо приказал блюстителям покинуть заставу и вывел их в туннель под предлогом подавления мятежа. Однако затем он начал вести среди солдат пропаганду и распространять непочтительные речи. Он убеждал бойцов, что они должны примкнуть к мятежным элементам и расправляться со старшими офицерами".

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."
languages.original_text: "Изменой. Капитан Френзо приказал блюстителям покинуть заставу и вывел их в туннель под предлогом подавления мятежа. Однако затем он начал вести среди солдат пропаганду и распространять непочтительные речи. Он убеждал бойцов, что они должны примкнуть к мятежным элементам и расправляться со старшими офицерами".

traits.locale_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. However, he then began to spread propaganda and disseminate irreverence among the soldiers. He convinced the men that they should join the mutiny and dispose of senior officers."

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. However, he then began to spread propaganda and disseminate irreverence among the soldiers. He convinced the men that they should join the mutiny and dispose of senior officers."

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverance among the soldiers. He convinced them that they should join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverance among the soldiers. He convinced them that they should join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

"By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

languages.text: «Traición. El capitán Frensoe ordenó a los agentes abandonar el puesto y los condujo a un túnel con el pretexto de sofocar un motín. No obstante, en cuanto llegaron, empezó a dar un discurso propagandístico alentando a la irreverencia entre los soldados. Les urgió a unirse al motín y eliminar a los oficiales veteranos».
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

traits.locale_text: «Traición. El capitán Frensoe ordenó a los agentes abandonar el puesto y los condujo a un túnel con el pretexto de sofocar un motín. No obstante, en cuanto llegaron, empezó a dar un discurso propagandístico alentando a la irreverencia entre los soldados. Les urgió a unirse al motín y eliminar a los oficiales veteranos».

languages.text: 「反逆的な内容です。フレンソー中隊長は、反乱を鎮圧するという口実で、エンフォーサーたちに前哨基地を離れるよう命じ、彼らをトンネルへと先導しました。しかし、トンネルに到着した途端、彼は兵士たちの信仰心を削ぐようなプロパガンダを流し始めたのです。反乱に参加し、上官を排除するよう働きかけました」
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

traits.locale_text: 「反逆的な内容です。フレンソー中隊長は、反乱を鎮圧するという口実で、エンフォーサーたちに前哨基地を離れるよう命じ、彼らをトンネルへと先導しました。しかし、トンネルに到着した途端、彼は兵士たちの信仰心を削ぐようなプロパガンダを流し始めたのです。反乱に参加し、上官を排除するよう働きかけました」

languages.text: “他们犯了叛国罪。弗伦索上尉命令执法者离开哨站，以镇压叛乱为借口带领他们进入隧道。然而，执法者一进入隧道，他就开始进行宣传，试图煽动士兵们的不满。他敦促所有人加入叛乱，消灭那些高阶军官。”
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

traits.locale_text: “他们犯了叛国罪。弗伦索上尉命令执法者离开哨站，以镇压叛乱为借口带领他们进入隧道。然而，执法者一进入隧道，他就开始进行宣传，试图煽动士兵们的不满。他敦促所有人加入叛乱，消灭那些高阶军官。”

languages.text: "Durch Verrat. Captain Frensoe hat den Enforcers befohlen, den Außenposten zu verlassen, und hat sie unter dem Vorwand, eine Meuterei unterdrücken zu wollen, in einen Tunnel geführt. Sobald sie jedoch in dem Tunnel waren, hat er begonnen, Propaganda zu verbreiten, um unter den Soldaten Respektlosigkeit zu nähren. Er hat sie gedrängt, sich der Meuterei anzuschließen und die ranghohen Offiziere zu eliminieren."
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

traits.locale_text: "Durch Verrat. Captain Frensoe hat den Enforcers befohlen, den Außenposten zu verlassen, und hat sie unter dem Vorwand, eine Meuterei unterdrücken zu wollen, in einen Tunnel geführt. Sobald sie jedoch in dem Tunnel waren, hat er begonnen, Propaganda zu verbreiten, um unter den Soldaten Respektlosigkeit zu nähren. Er hat sie gedrängt, sich der Meuterei anzuschließen und die ranghohen Offiziere zu eliminieren."

languages.text: « Par la trahison. Sous prétexte de réprimer une mutinerie, le capitaine Frensoe a ordonné aux prévôts de quitter l'avant-poste et les a conduits dans un tunnel, mais dès qu'ils sont arrivés sur place, il s'est mis à bombarder les soldats de propagande pour les pousser à se détourner du sacré. Il les a convaincus de se joindre à la mutinerie et d'éliminer les officiers supérieurs. »
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."

traits.locale_text: « Par la trahison. Sous prétexte de réprimer une mutinerie, le capitaine Frensoe a ordonné aux prévôts de quitter l'avant-poste et les a conduits dans un tunnel, mais dès qu'ils sont arrivés sur place, il s'est mis à bombarder les soldats de propagande pour les pousser à se détourner du sacré. Il les a convaincus de se joindre à la mutinerie et d'éliminer les officiers supérieurs. »

languages.text: "İhanetle. Yüzbaşı Frensoe, infazcılara mahalden ayrılmaları yönünde emir verdi. Güya onları, ayaklanmayı bastırmak amacıyla bir tünele göndermişti. Tünele ulaştıklarındaysa askerleri isyankârlık propagandasıyla galeyana getirmeye çalıştı. Ayaklanmaya katılıp kıdemli subayları öldürmelerini istedi."
languages.original_text: "By treason. Captain Frensoe ordered the enforcers to leave the outpost and led them into a tunnel under the pretext of suppressing a mutiny. As soon as they reached it, however, he began spreading propaganda in an effort to stir up irreverence among the soldiers. He urged them to join the mutiny and eliminate the senior officers."
